main event: On June 29, 1960, a civilian in Newton, Ohio observed a very bright object with color changes and finger-like projections moving slowly in the sky.
interesting points: The object changed colors, appearing white, then green and white., It had finger-like projections on one side., The witness estimated the object's speed to be 15,000 mph., The object seemed larger than stars and occasionally disappeared., The object exhibited unconventional behavior unlike known aircraft.
sighted object: very bright object with finger-like projections
witness description: A civilian observer who provided detailed information about the sighting
